trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wilsonville
There were no other sightings in Wilsonville on or around January 27th 2010
Summary: Bright orb approached Willamette river stopped was joined by 2nd orb.
divs: sighting details upon arriving home from shopping i was looking south from wilsonville.i noted a bright orange round orb approaching from the southeast.at first i thoughtit might be a plane untill it stopped mid-air over the willamette river.the distance i would estimate was between 1\4,and 1\2 mile from my position.the object hung in the air motionless for several minutes.looking south the first object was joined by another orb that was pulsating different colors.it stopped at the same elevation as the first orb.both seemed to be about the same diameter although the orange orb was closer to my vantage point.this is my first official report of this occurrance.i have noted lights moving to the river before but have never had the opportunity to have an unobstructed veiw.the orbs hung motionless for a number of minutes at approximatley 500 feet altitude.i went inside to get my binoculars,and upon returning to my vantage spot noted the objects still holding their distance,and altitude but moving together in a northeasterly direction till they both dissappeared behind the trees.diameter of objects unknown,and they emmited no sound.duration of event approximatley 20 minutes.i did feel anxiety about what i was seeing.
